pageContext.claim: “It’s a total of $5.5 trillion in tax cuts, with most of those benefits going to working families, small businesses, and who?  The family farmer.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a ridiculous number for $1.5 trillion tax cut. Trump is only counting tax reductions, without adding in the other side of the ledger: the tax increases in the bill that help pay for most (but not all) of the cuts.
